original_text: Again I lifted my eyes and saw, and behold, four chariots came out from between two mountains. And the mountains were mountains of bronze.
korean_text: 내가 또 눈을 들어 본즉 네 병거가 두 산 사이에서 나오는데 그 산은 구리 산이더라

sentences.original_text: four chariots came out from between two mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 두 산 사이에서 네 병거가 나왔다

sentences.original_text: And the mountains were mountains of bronze
